H0.text: Scales indicate horizontal distance and are found on the map legend.

H1.text: Spikes indicate horizontal distance and are also found on the map legend.

H2.text: Edges indicate horizontal distance and are also found on the map legend.

H3.text: Variations indicate horizontal distance and are also found on the map legend.

A4.text: The scale of a map is the ratio of a distance on the map to the corresponding distance on the ground.

A5.text: In addition to the above many maps carry one or more (graphical) bar scales.
